Utterance: <synch>
Hi! It’s nice to see you again. How have you been since our last session?
Hi, Ellie! I’ve been doing well, thanks! I’ve been practicing yoga and meditation regularly.
That’s wonderful! How has incorporating meditation into your routine been for you?
It’s been really calming. I love how it helps me clear my mind before bed. I feel more restful.
That’s great to hear! It sounds like it’s contributing positively to your self-care. Have you noticed any changes in your relationships as a result?
Yes, I feel more patient with my kids. I’m not as quick to react, which helps a lot during our discussions.
That’s a significant improvement! How has that affected your conversations with your daughter?
We’ve been able to talk about more personal things without me getting defensive. I think she appreciates that I’m listening more.
That’s fantastic! It sounds like you’re building a deeper connection. Have there been any challenges in that area?
Sometimes, she still shuts down. I try to give her space, but I worry if I’m doing the right thing.
It’s good that you’re aware of her needs. Sometimes, it takes time for them to open up. Have you thought about how to approach her when she’s feeling that way?
I think I’ll just let her know that I’m here whenever she’s ready to talk. I don’t want to push her.
That’s a wise approach. It shows her that you respect her boundaries while still being supportive.
I hope so! I just want her to know she can talk to me about anything.
That’s important. And how has your relationship with your son been since you last met?
We’ve had a few more dinners together, and he seems more comfortable talking about his life.
That’s wonderful progress! What topics have you discussed?
Mostly his job and some of his future plans. It’s nice to hear him share his thoughts.
It sounds like you’re creating a safe space for him. Have you noticed any changes in how he interacts with you?
Yes, he seems more relaxed and open. I think he’s starting to trust that I’m not judging him.
That’s a huge step! Trust is so vital in any relationship. How are you feeling about your parenting journey overall?
I feel more confident. I’m learning to embrace the ups and downs, and I’m more forgiving of myself.
That’s a healthy mindset! It’s important to give yourself grace. What do you think has helped you the most in this journey?
I think it’s the combination of self-care and being open to learning. I’m realizing that it’s okay to not have all the answers.
That’s a powerful realization! It’s all about growth and adaptation. Is there anything else you’d like to explore today?
I guess I’m just curious about how to maintain this balance moving forward. It feels good, and I want to keep it up.
Maintaining balance is key. Would you like to set any goals for the upcoming weeks to help sustain this momentum?
Maybe I could set a goal to have one-on-one time with each of my kids weekly, along with my self-care routine.
That sounds like a fantastic plan! It will help strengthen your bond while prioritizing your well-being.
I’m excited about that! Thank you for your support.
You’re very welcome! I’m looking forward to hearing about your experiences next time.
Bye, Ellie! See you soon!
Bye! Take care!
